data: For patients with ammonia level greater than 100 micromol/L AND deteriorating level of consciousness
sodium phenylacetate-sodium benzoate-arginine (L) in 1050 mL D10W
g, IV, once, administer over: 90 minute, drug form: bag
sodium phenylacetate-sodium benzoate-arginine (L)-potassium chloride in 1050 mL D10W
g, IV, once, administer over: 24 hour, drug form: bag
